title: Login Issues on Mobile App
description: Users are experiencing difficulties logging into the mobile app using their existing credentials. The issue seems to be related to the authentication system.

title: Request for Additional Features
description: Would like to add a wishlist functionality and social sharing options to the e-commerce platform. These features would enhance user engagement significantly.

title: Billing Question - Invoice #inv-2
description: I have a question about the breakdown of costs in invoice INV-2024-002113. Could you provide more details about the app store submission fee?

title: Website Content Migration
description: Need assistance with migrating existing content from the old website to the new platform. There are about 200 pages of content that need to be transferred.

title: App Crashes on Android 14
description: The mobile app is crashing consistently on devices running Android 14. This is affecting a significant portion of our user base.
